You Should Never Tell A Psychopath They Are A Psychopath. It Upsets Them.

Lies, Decaption, Deceit on every turn.

err.maxTier: You have already reached the max tier available.
err.noBurnLeft: There is no one left to burn on your or the other's team.
err.noBurnYet: The burn command is not yet unlocked.
err.noParticipate: To use this command, you must check in at least once per round to maintain active status using `m!checkin`. Users who become inactive for more than 2 days (4 rounds) will be kicked.
err.noRequestLeft: You have used your alloted requests
err.notFound:
Cannot find that user or the user is not playing in the game.

Note: Usernames are case-sensitive.
err.notInGuild: You are not a member of this server
err.notPM: {}, This command must be sent by DM only.
err.notStarted: The game has not started yet.
err.notUnlocked:
Command not authorized!.

Crack more game codes to unlock this command.
err.reviveUsed: You have already used your ability to revive.
err.spec: You do not have permission to run this command. You are either dead or a spectator.
err.switchTeam: You already sent an invitation this round
err.switchTeamBlocked:
Someone has already made an offer to that player this round.

You may try to convince them to reject their existing offer.
err.unkCmd: Invalid Command. Type m!help for a list of commands.
err.unkPM: Unknown Command. Please enter commands through [private message](https://www.reddit.com/message/compose/?to=DozenIncBOT).
err.voteUser: You already casted your vote for this round.

commands:
Vote on a player to elminate.
`vote ID`

Burn a random eamate for information.
`burn ID`

Bring a player back from the dead.
`revive ID`

Request infromation on a player.
`request ID`

Request infromation on a player.
`request ID`

Enter a game code to advance to the next rank.
`unlock CODE`

Invite a player to switch to your team.
`convert ID`
rules: Each user is assigned to either MI6 or the Twelve.
You must investigate each other to determine who is on what side and eliminate the opponent.
Decipher and decrypt the clues provided in order to advance your rank and unlock more powerful investigation tools.

Vote out players who you suspect are the enemy. A player must receive a certain number of hits in order to be killed. After a certain amount of time, the number of votes required will be lowered to 1. Votes, aka hits, only last per round.
At the end of each round, an announcement will be made how many people are alive how many were killed.
You must choose your allies carefully to seek out the enemy.

preStm.addDummy: INSERT IGNORE INTO Mafia (`utc`,`username`,`team`,`alive`,`inactive`) VALUES ('0', 'DozenIncBOT', 2, 3,-999) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `username`=`username`,`team`=2, `alive`=3;
preStm.addUser: INSERT IGNORE INTO Mafia (`utc`, `username`) VALUES (%s, %s) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `alive`='1';
burn: SELECT `username` FROM Mafia WHERE (`team`=0 AND `alive`=1 AND NOT `username`=%s);
SELECT `username` FROM Mafia WHERE (`team`=1 AND `alive`=1 AND NOT `username`=%s);

cycle.killPlayer: UPDATE Mafia SET `alive`='0',`diedOnCycle`=%s WHERE username IN (SELECT vote FROM VoteCall GROUP BY VOTE HAVING COUNT(*) >= %s)
cycle.getAliveCnt: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(team) FROM Mafia WHERE `alive`='1') AS alive, (SELECT COUNT(team) FROM Mafia WHERE (`alive`='0' AND NOT `username`='DozenIncBOT')) AS dead
cycle.getTeamCnt: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(team) FROM Mafia WHERE (`alive`= 1 AND `team`=0)) AS TWELVE, (SELECT COUNT(team) FROM Mafia WHERE (`alive`= 1 AND `team`=1)) AS MI6
cycle.getDead: SELECT v.vote,m.team,count(*) AS cnt FROM VoteCall v, Mafia m WHERE v.vote = m.username GROUP BY v.vote HAVING cnt >= %s ORDER BY cnt DESC;
cycle.getInactive: SELECT username FROM Mafia WHERE (`inactive`>=%s AND `alive`=1);

preStm.digupUser: SELECT `team`,`tier`,`alive` FROM Mafia WHERE (`username`=%s AND (`alive`=0 OR `alive`=1));
preStm.getAll: SELECT `username` FROM Mafia WHERE ((`alive`=0 OR `alive`=1) AND NOT `username`='DozenIncBOT');
getList: SELECT `username` FROM Mafia WHERE (`alive`=0 AND NOT `username`='DozenIncBOT') ORDER BY `username` asc;
SELECT `username` FROM Mafia WHERE `alive`=1 ORDER BY `username` asc;
preStm.getPlaying: SELECT `username` FROM Mafia WHERE (`alive`=1 AND NOT `username`='DozenIncBOT');
preStm.getWinner: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(team) FROM Mafia WHERE (`alive`='1' AND `team`=0)) AS TWELVE, (SELECT COUNT(team) FROM Mafia WHERE (`alive`='1' AND `team`=1)) AS MI6
preStm.log: INSERT IGNORE INTO Log (`utc`,`username`,`action`) VALUES (%s, %s, %s) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `utc`=`utc`;
switchTeam: INSERT INTO TeamInvite (`username`, `target`) VALUES(%s, %s) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `username`=`username`;
UPDATE Mafia m, (SELECT `team` FROM Mafia WHERE `username`=%s) t SET m.team = t.team WHERE m.username=%s;
preStm.voteUser: INSERT INTO VoteCall (`username`, `vote`) VALUES(%s, %s) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `username`=`username`;

reply.addUser:
Hello <@{}, you have joined the game!

Your team will be assigned at the start of the game.

Type all commands here.

You can leave the game by replying !leave to this message. **You cannot rejoin once the game has started!**

For help type !help.
Type !rules for the rules.
reply.burnedUser:
You have been {} by <@{}>on round {}!

You are now a spectator, but can haunt your killer from beyond the grave. Others can view how you died on your user flair.
reply.burnedUserQuietly:
You have been {} by on round {}!

Someone higher up has decided to betray their own. You are now a spectator. Others can view how you died on your user flair.
cycle: You were inactive for 48 hours and were automatically kicked from the game. Please wait until after the current game ends to rejoin.
You have escaped your hit! Take back revenge now!
digupUser:
**Intelligence Report**

<@{}>is believed to be {} and is {}.

^(This information is believed to be {}% credible.)
reply.gameEnd:
The game has ended. [**Check the game thread to see who won**](https://reddit.com/r/{}/comments/{})

Thank you for playing!

If you don't want to keep your game flair, you can change it back by clicking on the community options button.
reply.gameStart:
The game has started.

**You are with {} and are working in {}!**
There are {} players.

Investigate everyone around you and help your team survive! 

[Don't forget to introduce yourself.](https://reddit.com/r/{}/comments/{})

^(You do not need to be present at all times to play. However, if you are inactive for more than 48 hours you will be kicked for inactivity.)
reply.hitAlertEsc:
Watch out <@{}>! A hit has been put on you!. 

You can escape this hit by correctly voting any of the people who put a hit on you.

This hit will expire after this round, round {}.
reply.hitAlert:
Watch out <@{}>! A hit has been put on you!. 

You may try to convice others to change their vote or be killed! Higher ranking members have the ability to escape.

This hit will expire after this round, round {}.
reply.promote:
Code Accepted!

You have been promoted to {}.

sticky.halt: The game has been halted! Please wait for further information about this interuption.
sticky.pause:
The game is not active.

Users can join or leave by [private messaging](https://www.reddit.com/message/compose/?to=DozenIncBOT) me with !join or !leave.

[**Send Command Here**](https://www.reddit.com/message/compose/?to=DozenIncBOT)

Attention the bot has reached its current rate limit.

Bot execution will be paused for {} seconds.
sticky.reset:
The game has ended and is being reset. Commands are no longer being read.

Please wait for further information.
sticky.restart:
The current game has ended and will be restarted. Teams will be reassigned on game start.

Please wait for further information.
sticky.start:
The game has started with {} players.

Introduce yourself to each other and seek out the enemy.
